name: Change From Baseline in ADAS-Cog Total Score at Week 24

steps.action: Verify baseline_adas_cog_score is a valid measurement at Week 0
Verify days_from_baseline is within [161, 175] days (24 weeks Â± 7 days)

algorithm.result: Return change in ADAS-Cog score from baseline to Week 24

output.interpretation: Negative values indicate improvement in cognitive function; positive values indicate worsening

validationRules: baseline_adas_cog_score and week24_adas_cog_score must be between 0 and 70 inclusive
days_from_baseline must be within acceptable range [161, 175]
